_project.type: New ADU Above Existing Garage (2nd Floor Addition)

description: Cover sheet for new ADU above existing garage at 326 Flint Ave., Long Beach. Includes governing codes (2022 CBC, CalGreen, Title 24), scope of work (~540 sq.ft. ADU, 2-bed/1-bath above garage), general notes, separate permits list, sheet index, vicinity map, abbreviations, designer's statement, and project data. Red 'APPROVED' stamp present.
key_content: Project type: New 2nd floor ADU above existing garage (2-bed, 1-bath, ~540 sq.ft.)
Governing codes: 2022 CBC, 2022 CRC, 2022 CalGreen, 2022 Title 24, City of Long Beach Municipal Code
Scope: New staircase with top landing (73.5 sq.ft.), new covered patio, new electric ductless heat pump mini-split (single-zone system)
(E) gas water heater flush mounted in frame/stucco enclosure
General notes: 21 items covering construction requirements, dust control, dig alert, waste management, public works coordination
Separate permits required for: retaining walls/block fence walls, swimming pools, spas, patio covers, sheds, fences over 6 ft, fire sprinklers, fireplace, water meter box, water heater, MEP plans
NOT SHOWN: ADU bedroom/bathroom count in project data (stated in scope as 2-bed/1-bath)
NOT SHOWN: structural engineer name (not legible on this sheet)
NOT SHOWN: existing home square footage

drawing_zones.content: Project header: NEW ADU ABOVE GARAGE, main home and ADU addresses
ADU logo and Ideal Designs firm logo
Governing codes list and separate permits required
General Notes (21 numbered items) — construction requirements, dust control, waste, public works
Scope of Work (section 12) — ADU description, staircase, patio, HVAC, water heater
Designer's Statement and Pre-Construction Inspection APPROVED stamp
Sheet Index with APPROVED stamp overlay
Project Consultants (section 8) — Anthony Mirtney, Building Plan Check
